actions.name: AddFacetToObject
actions.description: Grants permission to add a new Facet to an object

actions.name: ApplySchema
actions.description: Grants permission to copy input published schema into Directory with same name and version as that of published schema

actions.name: AttachObject
actions.description: Grants permission to attach an existing object to another existing object

actions.name: AttachPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to attach a policy object to any other object

actions.name: AttachToIndex
actions.description: Grants permission to attach the specified object to the specified index

actions.name: AttachTypedLink
actions.description: Grants permission to attach a typed link b/w a source & target object reference

actions.name: BatchRead
actions.description: Grants permission to perform all the read operations in a batch. Each individual operation inside BatchRead needs to be granted permissions explicitly

actions.name: BatchWrite
actions.description: Grants permission to perform all the write operations in a batch. Each individual operation inside BatchWrite needs to be granted permissions explicitly

actions.name: CreateDirectory
actions.description: Grants permission to create a Directory by copying the published schema into the directory

actions.name: CreateFacet
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new Facet in a schema

actions.name: CreateIndex
actions.description: Grants permission to create an index object

actions.name: CreateObject
actions.description: Grants permission to create an object in a Directory

actions.name: CreateSchema
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new schema in a development state

actions.name: CreateTypedLinkFacet
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new Typed Link facet in a schema

actions.name: DeleteDirectory
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a directory. Only disabled directories can be deleted

actions.name: DeleteFacet
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a given Facet. All attributes and Rules associated with the facet will be deleted

actions.name: DeleteObject
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an object and its associated attributes

actions.name: DeleteSchema
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a given schema

actions.name: DeleteTypedLinkFacet
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a given TypedLink Facet. All attributes and Rules associated with the facet will be deleted

actions.name: DetachFromIndex
actions.description: Grants permission to detach the specified object from the specified index

actions.name: DetachObject
actions.description: Grants permission to detach a given object from the parent object

actions.name: DetachPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to detach a policy from an object

actions.name: DetachTypedLink
actions.description: Grants permission to detach a given typed link b/w given source and target object reference

actions.name: DisableDirectory
actions.description: Grants permission to disable the specified directory

actions.name: EnableDirectory
actions.description: Grants permission to enable the specified directory

actions.name: GetAppliedSchemaVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to return current applied schema version ARN, including the minor version in use

actions.name: GetDirectory
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve metadata about a directory

actions.name: GetFacet
actions.description: Grants permission to get details of the Facet, such as Facet Name, Attributes, Rules, or ObjectType

actions.name: GetLinkAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve attributes that are associated with a typed link

actions.name: GetObjectAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve attributes within a facet that are associated with an object

actions.name: GetObjectInformation
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve metadata about an object

actions.name: GetSchemaAsJson
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a JSON representation of the schema

actions.name: GetTypedLinkFacetInformation
actions.description: Grants permission to return identity attributes order information associated with a given typed link facet

actions.name: ListAppliedSchemaArns
actions.description: Grants permission to list schemas applied to a directory

actions.name: ListAttachedIndices
actions.description: Grants permission to list indices attached to an object

actions.name: ListDevelopmentSchemaArns
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the ARNs of schemas in the development state

actions.name: ListDirectories
actions.description: Grants permission to list directories created within an account

actions.name: ListFacetAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve attributes attached to the facet

actions.name: ListFacetNames
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the names of facets that exist in a schema

actions.name: ListIncomingTypedLinks
actions.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of all incoming TypedLinks for a given object

actions.name: ListIndex
actions.description: Grants permission to list objects attached to the specified index

actions.name: ListManagedSchemaArns
actions.description: Grants permission to list the major version families of each managed schema. If a major version ARN is provided as SchemaArn, the minor version revisions in that family are listed instead

actions.name: ListObjectAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to list all attributes associated with an object

actions.name: ListObjectChildren
actions.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of child objects associated with a given object

actions.name: ListObjectParentPaths
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all available parent paths for any object type such as node, leaf node, policy node, and index node objects

actions.name: ListObjectParents
actions.description: Grants permission to list parent objects associated with a given object in pagination fashion

actions.name: ListObjectPolicies
actions.description: Grants permission to return policies attached to an object in pagination fashion

actions.name: ListOutgoingTypedLinks
actions.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of all outgoing TypedLinks for a given object

actions.name: ListPolicyAttachments
actions.description: Grants permission to return all of the ObjectIdentifiers to which a given policy is attached

actions.name: ListPublishedSchemaArns
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve published schema ARNs

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to return tags for a resource

actions.name: ListTypedLinkFacetAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of attributes associated with typed link facet

actions.name: ListTypedLinkFacetNames
actions.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of typed link facet names that exist in a schema

actions.name: LookupPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to list all policies from the root of the Directory to the object specified

actions.name: PublishSchema
actions.description: Grants permission to publish a development schema with a version

actions.name: PutSchemaFromJson
actions.description: Grants permission to update a schema using JSON upload. Only available for development schemas

actions.name: RemoveFacetFromObject
actions.description: Grants permission to remove the specified facet from the specified object

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add tags to a resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a resource

actions.name: UpdateFacet
actions.description: Grants permission to add/update/delete existing Attributes, Rules, or ObjectType of a Facet

actions.name: UpdateLinkAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to update a given typed link’s attributes. Attributes to be updated must not contribute to the typed link’s identity, as defined by its IdentityAttributeOrder

actions.name: UpdateObjectAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to update a given object's attributes

actions.name: UpdateSchema
actions.description: Grants permission to update the schema name with a new name

actions.name: UpdateTypedLinkFacet
actions.description: Grants permission to add/update/delete existing Attributes, Rules, identity attribute order of a TypedLink Facet

actions.name: UpgradeAppliedSchema
actions.description: Grants permission to upgrade a single directory in-place using the PublishedSchemaArn with schema updates found in MinorVersion. Backwards-compatible minor version upgrades are instantaneously available for readers on all objects in the directory

actions.name: UpgradePublishedSchema
actions.description: Grants permission to upgrade a published schema under a new minor version revision using the current contents of DevelopmentSchemaArn
